content:
I posted a question in the forum on Friday asking for advice on how to approach a scheduling scenario in BackdropCMS or Drupal 7. I figured someone with Drupal, but not Backdrop experience might have ideas and I could translate them.

Check out the detailed answer I got, providing step by step instructions in Drupal 7.
https://forum.backdropcms.org/comment/2157#comment-2157

I walked all the way through them in Backdrop and everything work as expected. I had concerns about the Rules portion of this recipe, but it all worked great!
